CustomField.description: The name of the callback class used to implement a custom filter for a given Invoice Run. The custom filter will augment the stock filter used to fetch Billing Schedules when creating a batch of Invoices.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The name of the callback class used to implement a custom filter for a given Invoice Run. The custom filter will augment the stock filter used to fetch Billing Schedules when creating a batch of Invoices.
CustomField.label: Invoice Filter Callback Class
